website_summaries.verdict: Though they aren't pro-level golf balls, they are a great deal and suitable for most players' swing or for practicing and improving your golf game.
pros: Affordable balls that deliver reasonable distance, especially for novice to intermediate players
Choice of 4 colors - orange, white, yellow, or pink, and users love how easy the bright colors are to find on the course
cons: A few reports of balls splitting with typical use

customer_reviews.title: Horrible balls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift, and the recipient let me know that they are the worst golf balls they have ever used. They had to use a new ball after each drive due to the plastic coating coming off. They were super frustrated as they were using them in a tournament. My own fault for purchasing them and not knowing enough about golf to make a wise choice. These will never be purchased by me or anyone I know again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Worst golf balls!!
customer_reviews.text: Played a round today using these balls. Like other reviews, first two balls cracked almost in half. Third ball busted in two! Do NOT WASTE your money! Poor Poor quality. This doesn't happen with ANY other golfball I've ever used! I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Munia

customer_reviews.title: Worst I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Some of the worst golf balls I have ever used. On the 3rd hole i actually broke a ball in half. I have never witnessed this before with any other golf ball. All the other balls in the pack had developed cracks after only one or two holes. i will never be using this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: jbond2424

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 12 yr old Grandson last Christmas to support his newfound interest in golf. He's not a "crusher", but we have seen a few of them crack during a round of golf. Price seemed very good, but cracking this easily is unacceptable to sx.
customer_reviews.author: sulyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This balls are good for beginners not for intermediate players. I bought them when I went golfing with my little brother. Easy and bright to see. However when I hit it with my 3 wood smashed the ball to bits. So if you have a fast swing you dont want to use these balls. Cheap and good for beginners not meant for weekly players.
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez 89

customer_reviews.title: These are not the Nitro balls I'm used to playing
customer_reviews.text: The old adage, "you get what you pay for ", is true. In the first sleeve I opened, two of the balls had what I call hang nails or chips sticking up. I checked my other sleeves and found two more balls with the same condition. The ball flight with the good balls is straight but a definite lack of distance. Save your money on this deal.
customer_reviews.author: kgsan

customer_reviews.title: Good value butt...
customer_reviews.text: Balls are good value. I would of put 4 stars but I received the wrong color. I ordered orange but I received pink. I play in a league with my boss and several coworkers and It is kind of embarrassing to have to explain why you have pink balls. I wish I was able to reach out and get them exchanged but I needed them the same day I received them so I had no choice. I hope they do a better job next time.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Powell

customer_reviews.title: For all Orange Fanatics
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with orange golf balls is they remind me of Donald Trump. But they're extra visible and announce to the world that you don't take golf too seriously.
customer_reviews.author: David Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find!
customer_reviews.text: In a world of white balls, be orange! I never have trouble knowing which ball is mine even when I haven’t marked it. It is a good color for a beginner golfer who spends a lot of time hunting for where that ball went. Makes it easy to spot! Otherwise it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McAdoo

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They work. I did not think about trying to find these balls in the Fall...they blend in easy with new england trees. Easy to find on the green.
customer_reviews.author: Llocsird'o Ttam

customer_reviews.title: Visually outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and after seeing them was very pleased and will play them myself. The orange color is easier to see on the grass of the fairway and greens than yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing golf so the best balls are not for me , i have a club head speed of 126 on my driver i have never cracked the balls or split them open before best bang for the buck .
customer_reviews.author: DTRAIN ct

customer_reviews.title: Bright Orange Balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a friend and he loves them. Probably because he shanks every GD ball into the woods and the orange makes them easy to find. They are cheap too so if you lose one who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Before reading other reviews, I found that the cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Before reading other reviews, I found that the cover on these balls started to shred after only 2-3 holes. I've never seen a cover of a ball so weak before. But after reading about how these balls fracture, I know I'm not alone. I will NEVER buy these balls again!
customer_reviews.author: Laurence R

customer_reviews.title: didn't help my game but
customer_reviews.text: these didn't help my game but they did help me find the ball when they went into the trees or way off the green. :o
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fun color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and price. These are great golf balls for a golfer that tends to lose several balls during a round.
customer_reviews.author: ShanMacTell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it during his gulf practice and it easy to find it in the field.
customer_reviews.author: silvia

customer_reviews.title: Balls that Explode
customer_reviews.text: When the first ball exploded, I thought it was a one time occurrence but a week later, another one cracked in half. When talking to some golfer friends about these balls, they said that they also had Nitro balls that broke up. I will never purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find when still learning and frequently in the brush.
customer_reviews.text: Used for color that is easy to find when with golf novices. Finding the balls was like an Easter egg hunt with our young learners.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi-chan

customer_reviews.title: great color golf balls
customer_reviews.text: I can find the golf ball the color jumps out of the grass. especially when it goes out in the very very rough or into the desert.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I can see them better against the sky
customer_reviews.text: these are orange golf balls, I can see them better against the sky, but like white golf balls they can be lost in the long green grass. they are as long as other balls I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: So I don't care when my drive slices into the woods.
customer_reviews.text: The bright color made it easier to find when I hit it into the rough (most of the time). Also at the price I don't care as much if I loose a whole sleeve during the round.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a single drive
customer_reviews.text: Not super satisified with these golf balls. I got them as a cheap alternative for when the visibility isn't quite there. 2 out of the first three balls i hit cracked after i initially hit the drive. Very disappointed but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas G

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility and distance
customer_reviews.text: Great golf ball for distance and control. Easy to see...
customer_reviews.author: kathie r

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are junk. I went golfing with these balls twice now, and broke 4 balls. I have NEVER broken a ball before. I just started golfing last year and am still working on developing my swing. There is no way I hit the ball hard enough to have the ball split in two like it does. I am very disappointed in the quality of the balls. Oct 2015-I ended up breaking every single ball I bought. Having more experience, I am not sure if I just got a bad batch, or the company makes cheap balls. These are the only balls I have broken, and I have tried many brands. DO NOT BUY these balls!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Rosonke

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a silent auction basket. The balls seemed to be of good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sarverwest

customer_reviews.title: Good if you lose balls.
customer_reviews.text: I lose balls alot so these are helpful and they travel well.
customer_reviews.author: Kilian

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap ball.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. If you’re an amature and going to lose 3 sleeves per 8 holes, there’s no sense buying Pro V1’s
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong item.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these balls are great but I ordered orange and received pink.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Golf balls with terrific bright colors
customer_reviews.text: For the price, great golf balls in terrific colors. Easy to see on a golf course. I have already reordered. Fast shipping. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Island Gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color makes it easier to see the ball on the fair way
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Brame

customer_reviews.title: Bright orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. It arrived quickly. It appears to meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, these are balls
customer_reviews.text: Golf balls. I ordered them. I got them. Yup, balls.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good visible golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Good balls for a great price and easier to see
customer_reviews.author: William Scarfuto

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but don't buy it because you think it will go further. It doesn't go any further than the three balls I hit along side it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Epps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice feel, works well for me and I like the color
customer_reviews.author: m. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Let'r rip
customer_reviews.text: No problems here. I enjoy the balls as the prince point is awesome. I used 2 of these the other day and had no issue with "cracking in half". I'm not a soft hitter either. 285 all day baby.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best ball to see
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I tried this color - in my opinion, it is the most easily seen ball.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a lower cost golf ball
customer_reviews.text: I'm new at golf and see no difference in how far I can hit these balls compared to balls costing three or four times as much, I'm very pleased with using these balls and highly recommend them for anyone, plus the bright orange color is easier to find on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find, not durable
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I broke balls after one tee off. Easy to find on the course, but not durable by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but worked great with vibrant orange color
customer_reviews.text: used for a science experiment, not golf, but worked great with vibrant orange color.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelean J

customer_reviews.title: These balls seem as good as any others I hit
customer_reviews.text: I don't take my game too seriously. These balls seem as good as any others I hit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blyth

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice only
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balls for chipping around in your back yard. Bright orange so you can see them before you run them over with the lawn mower. I would never use these in a round though. They're cheap in quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Good Balls for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls for the price. The color helps you find the ball easier on the course (assuming your not in the woods).
customer_reviews.author: Beavis

customer_reviews.title: Work pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher, and I tried these for a winter round this past weekend. They seemed to fly as far or sometimes farther than more expensive balls.
customer_reviews.author: iemusic

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for children
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my kids every year for Christmas. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrsti Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the balls
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the balls, and the price I paid for them.t performed the same as an expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Bayon

customer_reviews.title: Their OK
customer_reviews.text: These balls are not very friendly I don't​ think but they should get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great balls!
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls are great for the purpose I use them for. I'm a personal trainer and I use them for self myofascial release on my clients. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color - will never lose your golf ball again!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Fun color and great for day to day play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: A good inexpensive ball for the average golfer. I've only been playing 6 years so I'm not ready for the high-end stuff yet! I go with orange because (A). I'm blind as a bat and (B). I like being orginal
customer_reviews.author: mrdaveo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Lacks durability, but if you’re new to golf it gets the job done ✅
customer_reviews.author: jake reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great backup balls
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Basically the same price as Walmart but delivered to your door. Nothing wrong with that.
customer_reviews.author: BWL

customer_reviews.title: Hot balls!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and balls are very hot off the tee
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: it was a cold day and it felt like I was hitting a rock
customer_reviews.text: thought I would not lose them because of the bright color. wound up losing 3 in the leaves. it was a cold day and it felt like I was hitting a rock.
customer_reviews.author: SubGoBus

customer_reviews.title: they are easy to see as they fly through the air
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy them for golf; I bought them for my engineering students for studying trajectory. As I hoped, they are easy to see as they fly through the air.
customer_reviews.author: RSH

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered orange golf balls and I recieved pink golf balls
customer_reviews.author: Chris Branch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hit good and easy to find when I shank it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kinn

customer_reviews.title: Cracks and splits
customer_reviews.text: Got these balls as a Christmas gift and finally got the chance to use them. One ball now has a large split in it and another has a spiderweb where it is cracking. The color is great for finding them, but I would pass on these because they have no durability. I am not a big guy and don't have an overpowered swing, so if I can crack these open, anyone who can make solid contact can.
customer_reviews.author: John Knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spot and cheap. Good for beginner golfers like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Donovan

customer_reviews.title: If you want balls with true enhancement for distance these ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want balls with true enhancement for distance these are not it. But they are bright and I haven't lost one yet.
customer_reviews.author: t.disberry

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive ball
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive ball. The optic orange is easier to find during the autumn months when leaves are on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: geraldo

customer_reviews.title: For beginners only
customer_reviews.text: Great at first, but now that I am more experienced I crack them on drives
customer_reviews.author: cawithagat

customer_reviews.title: Unless you're a scratch player, buy cheap balls!
customer_reviews.text: They're cheap and really orange. Perfect for hackers like me that don't always hit the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Mark - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad ball
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered as they almost always do. With that said... These balls are terrible. If you don't want to hit straight or far then this is the ball for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mo M.

customer_reviews.title: I'll never buy them again. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I agree that these are not good. I had five out of 100 crack or break in half. I'll never buy them again. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need more since my wife took my last set.
customer_reviews.author: BeeOhBee

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Great balls for practices or play the game beacuse you can find it very fast, I recommend it so you can ordered
customer_reviews.author: Victor Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good ball for the price. Distance compares with more expensive balls. Vibrant color is easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: william e. perkins

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, worst ball ever! I played with them for my last two rounds and never differ so many shots in my entire life. I switched over midway through the round start hitting practice balls with much greater accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: He loved the color
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for an avid golfer. They were an instant hit. He loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to find on the course and a pleasing orange color.
customer_reviews.author: Bird lover

customer_reviews.title: but okay and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the color orange was a little brighter, but okay and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the ball color they help me find them easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft ball but very fun to fly. Very playable, findable.
customer_reviews.author: John Rieley

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these Nitro golfballs!
customer_reviews.text: My first ball cracked severely after only 4 holes. I got out another and in split into two pieces the first time I hit it with a driver. That's it I'm done with them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: not as easy to see as I had hoped but still an ...
customer_reviews.text: not as easy to see as I had hoped but still an ok ball to hit at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: BIRD56

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can see and find these ones in the deep grass.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good golf balls. are not made for competition, but definitely for playing most rounds. good valued price
customer_reviews.author: robert valiska

customer_reviews.title: The ball broke in half 30 yards after I hit ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball broke in half 30 yards after I hit it and went in different directions so I had to drop a different ball and take a stroke
customer_reviews.author: T Buchas

customer_reviews.title: ... first ball I hit cracked and I was very disappointed in the distance of these balls
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I hit cracked and I was very disappointed in the distance of these balls. I will never buy Nitro balls again...there is a reason they were so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: George W. Gorsuch

customer_reviews.title: Goes far and then can find
customer_reviews.text: These go far and easy to find. I have a tendency to not hit it down the middle of the fairway. Finding the ball is important. Nitro is not a big name in golf balls, but these work for my game. Later post after using awhile - tested the balls after use and find they don't bounce as high as other golf balls. I will now only use these after I bounce test them after each round. Reduced from 5 stars to 2.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Substandard golf ball
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I used cracked by the 15th hole. These are not a very good ball.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Water seekers! They love woods!
customer_reviews.text: These balls like water and woods. I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning these golf balls crack
customer_reviews.text: Great color and good distance while they last. Like many other reviewers, I have had multiple cracks form on these balls. They just don't last. I would not recommended these golf balls to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Olson

customer_reviews.title: Ok they are easy to find on the fairway
customer_reviews.text: Ok they are easy to find on the fairway. I don't know what they are made of but their distance sucks and they sound terrible when you hit them. We switched to used Callaways 1/2 way through our most recent round and immediately got 20% greater distance. If this doesn't matter to you, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: You can see it, find it and it is round and does the job....and the price is right and you won't go fishing if it finds a watery grave....what more can you wish for....it gets birdies and pars like expensive balls.
customer_reviews.author: connie peebles

customer_reviews.title: Great for folks with bad eyesight
customer_reviews.text: These balls are nice and bright. A great value also. I get really good distance from them, and for an old lady that is a plus. They putt pretty well also, a little harder than Laddie's, but all in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Meadow

customer_reviews.title: The ball cracked on me. Went through the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball cracked on me. Went through the whole box on one round.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: So terrible golf ball!!
customer_reviews.text: I used 6 balls, but 3 balls were cracked. So I didn't use another these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Joo yeon Kang

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: For a driving ball it's alright. For using it for a round of gold Don't do it
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: nitro golf balls
customer_reviews.text: very good balls they really stand out on the course
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible do not buy the balls crack after 3 hits
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great for the price, as they hit well (distance-wise), but they are definitely not durable. The outside plastic layer peels and slices easily leaving you with a ball that does not roll very predictably on the greens!
customer_reviews.author: David M Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: The merchandise is as advertised. It was delivered on ...
customer_reviews.text: The merchandise is as advertised. It was delivered on time. The only problem is that they appear to be right handed balls. Just kidding. I will order more as these find their way to water.
customer_reviews.author: Fatfinger

customer_reviews.title: Not great in the fall
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything bad to say about the balls themselves, but the color is a two-edged sword. I thought they would really stand out on the fairway, but I forgot that it's October and there are also orange leaves on the fairway. I've never lost balls so quickly. Chalk it up to user error, but I will probably have to keep these to the side for the next 6-9 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price an excellent go to daily play ball
customer_reviews.text: For the price an excellent go to daily play ball. Last long in play, if you don't loose it, and they give us comparable distance to some other higher priced rated balls.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great golf balls for my beginner daughter! Her favorite color is orange, so of course we had to get orange balls.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Francis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gifts so looking forward to hearing if good enough to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trish the Dish

customer_reviews.title: The worst balls I ever played with
customer_reviews.text: worst in durability, after 9 holes two balls were actually fraying! I give it one star for color and price only. I think this ball is only suitabable for very light ball striking.
customer_reviews.author: curious shopper

product_meta.title: Nitro NMD12OBXC Maximum Distance Golf Ball (12-Pack), Orange
product_meta.description: Size:One SizeThe Nitro Maximum Distance Golf Balls have a Solid 2-piece titanium core which maximizes the energy transfer from club head to golf ball. Aerodynamic and symmetrical dimple design increases lift and decreases drag for higher, longer shots. Softer feel 85 compression, exceptional spin control with long distance off your woods. Dupont Lithium Surlyn cut proof cover for long term durability. Developed for all levels of Golfer, from beginning golfer to professional golfer to elite golfer. Nitro Maximum Distance Golf Balls Conform to USGA rules. About Nitro Golf™ At Nitro Golf, one of the fastest growing golf companies in the industry, we believe in building quality product without compromising performance. Today’s golfer demands high-performance products that give results. Nitro Golf does just that! And it won’t break your bank! For the last 25 years, Nitro’s DNA has remained consistent – listen to the customer, build performance product, be reasonable, be an experience. Some in the industry say… serious balls for serious golfers, Nitro says “affordable balls for today’s golfer.” OUR MISSION To provide the highest performance golf equipment at an affordable price With Nitro Golf, everyone can afford to play!
feature_bullets: SUPER REACTIVE 2 PIECE TITANIUM CORE tournament construction maximizes the energy transfer from club head to ball, spins less, giving explosive distance off your metal woods
HIGH VELOCITY LONG DISTANCE The aerodynamic and symmetrical dimple design increases lift and decreases drag allowing for higher, longer shots with exceptional spin control
VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE cut-proof cover is constructed of Dupont Lithium Surlyn for long term durability, high performance, outstanding resilience, and excellent resistance to cuts and abrasions

ENHANCED PERFORMANCE consistent ball flight in all conditions, responsive cover and core deliver optimal distance off the tee, low-compression design provides soft feel around the green and consistent ball flight
USGA APPROVED Conforms to all USGA rules, developed for and appeals to all levels of player from beginning golfer to professional to elite golfer. 12 ball pack (4 boxes of 3) in highly-visible Orange

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars548 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
